    • ClaimSpot

      public void ClaimSpot(User user) throws DataAccessException
      A method for claiming a spot in the game. The player's username is provided and should be saved as either the whitePlayer or blackPlayer in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - object with all the user's information
      Throws:
      DataAccessException
